# loading the packages

```{r setup}
library(targets)

library(knitr)

library(tidyverse)

library(Radviz)

theme_set(theme_light(base_size = 16))
tar_config_set(store = params$store)
```

# loading the data

```{r data}
tar_load(markers)
tar_load(annots)
tar_load(live.mem.plot)
tar_load(live.hilbert.proj)
tar_load(pheno.rv)
tar_load(func.rv)
tar_load(live.tsne.proj)
```

# MEM results

```{r}
live.mem.plot+
    geom_point(aes(color = Stimulation))+
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

# HilbertSimilarity

```{r}
live.hilbert.proj+
    geom_line(aes(group = Individual))+
    geom_point(aes(color = Stimulation,
                   size = N))
```

```{r,fig.height=8}
tar_load(live.hilbert.dist)
plot(hclust(live.hilbert.dist))
```

# Radviz {.tabset}

## Phenotypic

```{r}
plot(pheno.rv)+
    geom_density2d(aes(color = Stimulation))
```

## Functional

```{r}
plot(func.rv)+
    geom_density2d(aes(color = Stimulation))
```
